caseStudies.title: Strathmore University
caseStudies.subtitle: Empowering Learning Through Smart Campus Technology
caseStudies.challenge: Strathmore University sought to modernize its lecture halls and digital learning environments to support hybrid education and seamless collaboration. The goal was to enhance the student learning experience through technology-driven classrooms that could be centrally managed while maintaining academic excellence and sustainability.
caseStudies.solution: Proscene implemented an AV-over-IP infrastructure across lecture halls and innovation hubs. The solution integrated wireless presentation systems, professional video conferencing tools, and centralized control panels for easy classroom management. The system supports real-time lectures, remote participation, and cloud-based learning applications.

keyFeatures.title: Centralized AV Control
keyFeatures.description: Allows IT administrators to manage all classrooms remotely through a single dashboard with real-time analytics.

keyFeatures.title: Hybrid Learning Integration
keyFeatures.description: Supports both in-person and remote teaching via HD video conferencing and live content sharing.

keyFeatures.title: Wireless Presentation Systems
keyFeatures.description: Enables instructors and students to present effortlessly from any device.

keyFeatures.title: Energy-Efficient Systems
keyFeatures.description: Optimized display and lighting systems that contribute to Strathmore’s green campus initiative.

testimonial.quote: The transformation has made our teaching experience more interactive and accessible. Our hybrid learning capabilities now truly reflect the excellence Strathmore is known for.
testimonial.author: Head of IT

caseStudies.title: Kenya Film Classification Board (KFCB)
caseStudies.subtitle: Enabling Nationwide Film Awareness Through a Mobile Cinema Solution
caseStudies.challenge: The Kenya Film Classification Board required an innovative way to extend film awareness, classification campaigns, and public education beyond fixed cinema locations. The challenge was to design a fully mobile, high-quality cinema system capable of delivering consistent audio-visual experiences across diverse environments while remaining reliable, secure, and easy to deploy.
caseStudies.solution: Proscene Systems designed and delivered a rigid truck fitted with a custom-built mobile cinema container, fully equipped with professional projection and sound systems. The solution enabled KFCB to conduct film screenings, workshops, and outreach events nationwide. The system was engineered for mobility, durability, and immersive viewing, ensuring consistent performance regardless of location.

keyFeatures.title: Custom Mobile Cinema Container
keyFeatures.description: Purpose-built container integrated onto a rigid truck for safe transport and rapid deployment.

keyFeatures.title: Professional Projection System
keyFeatures.description: High-brightness projection delivering clear and immersive visuals in varied environments.

keyFeatures.title: Cinema-Grade Audio System
keyFeatures.description: High-performance sound reinforcement designed for clarity and audience engagement.

keyFeatures.title: Ruggedized AV Integration
keyFeatures.description: Vibration-resistant mounting and secure installations optimized for mobile operation.

testimonial.quote: The mobile cinema solution has significantly enhanced our outreach efforts. The quality of sound and visuals allows us to engage audiences effectively wherever we go.
testimonial.author: Project Representative

caseStudies.title: Microsoft Kenya
caseStudies.subtitle: Delivering Scalable, Enterprise-Grade Collaboration Spaces at Microsoft ADC
caseStudies.challenge: Microsoft Kenya required a standardized, reliable, and high-performance Audio Visual and teleconferencing environment across multiple floors within its Africa Development Centre (ADC). The challenge was to equip more than 55 meeting, collaboration, and training rooms with consistent user experiences, seamless Microsoft Teams integration, and enterprise-grade reliability—while minimizing downtime and ensuring global Microsoft standards were met.
caseStudies.solution: Proscene Systems supplied, installed, configured, tested, and commissioned Audio Visual and teleconferencing systems across the 7th to 11th floors at Dunhill Towers. The deployment included fully integrated meeting room solutions designed for Microsoft Teams collaboration, supported by professional audio, video, and control systems. Comprehensive user training was provided to ensure high adoption and consistent system usage across all rooms.

keyFeatures.title: Microsoft Teams Rooms Integration
keyFeatures.description: Native Teams-enabled meeting spaces delivering a consistent collaboration experience.

keyFeatures.title: Scalable Room Designs
keyFeatures.description: Standardized AV configurations adapted across multiple room sizes and use cases.

keyFeatures.title: Professional Audio & Video
keyFeatures.description: High-quality microphones, cameras, and displays optimized for clarity and reliability.

keyFeatures.title: User Training & Enablement
keyFeatures.description: Hands-on training sessions to ensure confident usage and fast meeting start times.

testimonial.quote: Proscene delivered a consistent and reliable collaboration experience across our meeting spaces. The systems integrate seamlessly with Microsoft Teams and support the way our teams work every day.
testimonial.author: IT Representative

caseStudies.title: SBM Bank Kenya
caseStudies.subtitle: Boardroom & Collaboration Upgrade for Digital Transformation
caseStudies.challenge: SBM Bank's rapid expansion required modernized boardroom and meeting technology to support hybrid collaboration, executive decision-making, and digital transformation goals. Outdated systems limited productivity and international coordination.
caseStudies.solution: Proscene transformed SBM’s executive spaces with integrated video conferencing, beamforming microphones, PTZ cameras, and wireless presentation systems. Crestron touch panels now offer one-touch control for lighting, conferencing, and scheduling — all integrated with Google Workspace and Teams.

keyFeatures.title: Effortless Hybrid Collaboration
keyFeatures.description: Executives now engage with remote stakeholders through seamless, high-quality video and audio sessions.

keyFeatures.title: One-Touch Meeting Control
keyFeatures.description: Crestron touch panels provide simple, unified control of AV systems, lighting, and scheduling.

keyFeatures.title: Wireless Presentation
keyFeatures.description: Cable-free screen sharing from any device enhances flexibility and professionalism.

keyFeatures.title: Secure, Scalable Infrastructure
keyFeatures.description: AV-over-IP systems designed to meet banking security standards and scalability needs.

testimonial.quote: Our collaboration spaces are now world-class. Meetings start instantly, and connectivity issues are a thing of the past.
testimonial.author: Head of IT

caseStudies.title: Watoto Church
caseStudies.subtitle: Delivering Clear, Powerful Audio for Worship and Live Ministry
caseStudies.challenge: Watoto Church required a reliable, high-quality audio solution capable of delivering clear speech and impactful music for live worship services, sermons, and special events. The system needed to provide consistent coverage, intelligibility, and musical accuracy within a large worship environment while supporting the dynamic nature of live ministry.
caseStudies.solution: Proscene Systems supplied professional-grade audio equipment from RCF and QSC, carefully selected to meet the acoustic and performance requirements of the church. The solution ensured balanced sound coverage, clarity for spoken word, and powerful reinforcement for live music, enhancing the overall worship experience for the congregation.

keyFeatures.title: RCF Loudspeaker Systems
keyFeatures.description: High-performance speakers delivering consistent coverage and natural sound reproduction.

keyFeatures.title: QSC Amplification & Processing
keyFeatures.description: Reliable power and signal processing optimized for live worship environments.

keyFeatures.title: Optimized System Design
keyFeatures.description: Audio components selected to suit the size, acoustics, and use-case of the sanctuary.

keyFeatures.title: Future-Ready Infrastructure
keyFeatures.description: Scalable audio foundation capable of supporting future system expansion.

testimonial.quote: The sound quality and clarity have significantly improved our worship experience. The system delivers consistent performance and supports both spoken word and live music beautifully.
testimonial.author: Technical Team Representative
